  section {

  }
  .text-container {

    align-items: center;
  }
  .flex {

    flex-wrap:wrap; 
    justify-content: center;

  }

  }
  .shadow {

  }

  .services-parent {

    padding: 30px 5px;
  }
  .services-parent h1 {
    text-align: center;
    /* margin-bottom: -20px; */
  }
  .services-container {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    margin: 40px auto;
  }
  .services-container img {
    margin: 20px;
    max-width: 300px;
  }
  .services-container p {
    max-width: 500px;
    min-width: 300px;
  }
  .service-card-container {

  }
